QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_assessment.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_assessment where a.object_id = 5026781 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_assessment.id UNION select odf_ca_clr_assessment.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_assessment where a.object_id in (5026783) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_assessment.odf_parent_id
